sentences.en: ...a slight man with auburn hair and a freckled face.
sentences.cn: ...一个长有赤褐色头发和雀斑脸的纤弱男子。

sentences.en: He was a very active lad, fair - haired, freckled touch of the Dane or Norwegian about him.
sentences.cn: 他是个性子好动的孩子, 一头金发, 满脸雀斑,有点像丹麦人或挪威人.

sentences.en: He was tall, vigorous, sandy - haired, freckled, genial and voluble.
sentences.cn: 他个子高高的, 精神抖擞, 淡茶色的头发, 脸上有雀斑, 性情和蔼,口齿伶俐.

sentences.en: Her face was freckled all over.
Her freckled skin glowed with health again.
sentences.cn: 她长有雀斑的皮肤又泛出了健康的红光。

sentences.en: His eyes were anchored by the freckled face with its faint, bold smile.
sentences.cn: 他的眼光被那露出大胆微笑的雀斑脸庞给吸引住了.

sentences.en: His face was shallow, freckled, and his eyes were round child eyes.
sentences.cn: 他的脸扁扁的, 布满了雀斑, 长着一双稚气的圆眼睛.

sentences.en: One of her hands curved atop the other to form a pink, freckled molehill her desk.
sentences.cn: 她瞥着我,两只有雀斑的手交叉在桌面上,好像一座粉红色的小山丘.

sentences.en: Pierce's open, freckled face was grave.
sentences.cn: 皮尔斯那张有雀斑的大脸庞显得严肃庄重.

sentences.en: The child has skinny, freckled legs with prominent knees.
sentences.cn: 那孩子的腿很瘦, 长有斑痕,膝盖突出.

trans.tran_cn: 雀斑，斑点，晒斑，（使）生雀斑
雀斑，斑点( freckle的过去式和过去分词 )
